title: Strengthening Clinical Practical Competencies: Strategies for Recognizing and Managing Implicit Bias in Healthcare Professions

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Identify and explain at least three implicit bias cases that may occur in medical settings
Propose at least two specific strategies for improving bias awareness in small-group discussions
Analyze bias potential with at least 70% accuracy using mathematical statistical tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
